Detailed Description

Class for dealing with OpenCL kernels.

void ucl_opencl::UCL_Kernel::set_size ( const size_t  num_blocks,
const size_t  block_size 
) [inline]

Set the number of thread blocks and the number of threads in each block.

Note:
This should be called before any arguments have been added
The default command queue is used for the kernel execution

command_queue &  cq 
) [inline]

Set the number of thread blocks and the number of threads in each block.

Note:
This should be called before any arguments have been added
The default command queue for the kernel is changed to cq
